name: Rock Paper Scissors
description: A simple rock-paper-scissors game where the user can play against the computer. The game uses JavaScript to generate a random choice for the computer and compares it with the user's choice to determine the winner.

name: Weather App
description: A weather application that allows users to search for the current weather in any city. The app uses the AccuWeather API to fetch weather data.

name: Library
description: A simple library where you can add and delete books and mark them read.
